document.full_text: the world baseball classic will expand from 16 to 28 countries with the addition of a new qualifying round for the 2013 international competition, organizers said on wednesday.
document.title: world baseball classic expanding to 28 teams
lines_and_colors: the world baseball classic will expand from 16 to 28 countries with the addition of a new qualifying round for the 2013 international competition, organizers said on wednesday.
